attributes.action: reimburse the taxpayers for prisoners cost of living
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the ruling minority who abolished capital punishment and signed European Conventions preventing its reinstatement should have to compensate the taxpayers who have been forced to pay for criminals who, had it not been for abolition, would have been justly sentanced to death.

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are actually requesting the Government do. Please reword your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
